Identification.LongTitle: United Nations Operation in Somalia (UNOSOM) Medal Order

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, is pleased hereby to authorize Canadians to accept and wear the United Nations Operation in Somalia (UNOSOM) Medal in recognition of honourable service with the United Nations Operation in Somalia and to direct that that Medal follow the United Nations Transitional Authority in Cambodia (UNTAC) Medal in the order of precedence in the Canadian Honours System.
